projects.description: We started Art District with the desire to create a space for underrepresented and emerging artists, curators, and creatives to connect and for anyone who loves art to learn the stories of unique artists, new and established. The focus of this app is to give exposure to the stories, experiences and masterpieces of artists from all different backgrounds and allow the public to engage with, learn about and support these diverse artists. The legacies of many artists who didn't fit the mold of the status quo have often been pushed aside throughout history. The world of art has consistently grappled with inclusivity and the importance of removing these barriers is paramount. Our mission is to serve the vibrant art community and celebrate the diversity that makes art so important.

Hire Me Please is a responsive full stack application for creating and search through job seeker postings. Users can create posts with their name, email, and bio. These posts are searchable via keywords and deletable. All components are styled and fully responsive via Tailwind CSS. Database information is hidden beyind ENV variables and connected to a production database. App is scalable via Heroku and Elephant SQL.
Personal portfolio website built using HTML/CSS Grid and vanilla JS.

Barrel Hop is a responsive single-page brewery search website to query and utilize data from Open Brewery DB, Open Weather Map, and Unsplash. Hosted on Heroku utilizing Node.JS, Express and Heroku CLI. Card columns and search bar are fully responsive using breakpoints, APIs are queried with fetch requests and data is handled accordingly, and the linked brewery cards are generated with Javascript.
